title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie â€“  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.
